content.raw:
With the latest nightly builds, the GPU laser is generating unexpected returns when noise is added to free space returns (i.e. returns that don't intersect with anything.)

For example:
when a return of 30m is created (i.e. no return):

* A. some reported returns are 30m
* B. some reported returns are 29.9XXX 
* C. some reported returns are 0.1

I see this as the GPU ray tracer is returning 30m and then noise is added to result in the two odd cases (B & C).

@gerkey @nkoenig @thomasko have you seen this? Can you test this?
